description: Try our easy to follow Club Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Club Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 rasher rindless bacon, cut into thirds
2 chicken breast fillets, cut in half through the centre

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large non-stick frying pan over a medium-high heat until hot.
Season chicken fillets on both sides with salt and pepper.
Add 2 chicken pieces to the frying pan and cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover with foil to keep warm.
Add remaining chicken fillets to pan, adding more oil as required. Transfer to a plate.
Add the bacon to the pan and cook for 5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer bacon to plate with chicken. Toast the bread slices.

Place 8 slices of toast onto a chopping board. Spread each with aioli. Top 4 of the slices with chicken and turkey. Top remaining 4 slices with bacon, tomato and lettuce. Stack the bacon ones on top of the chicken ones and finish with the remaining toast. Cut in half diagonally. Place club sandwiches onto serving places. Serve with potato chips.
